  "description": "Talent-Nest Recruitment Hub -&nbsp;We are a forward-thinking renewable energy company committed to accelerating the transition to clean and sustainable power solutions. Our portfolio spans solar PV, wind, battery storage, and hybrid energy systems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Oregun Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and motivated Electrical Engineer with 3&ndash;5 years of experience in the solar energy industry.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing electrical systems and solutions for solar power projects, ensuring quality, efficiency, and regulatory compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop electrical systems and layouts for solar PV installations (on-grid and off-grid).
	Perform load calculations, system sizing, and equipment selection.
	Supervise and coordinate the installation, commissioning, and maintenance of solar power systems.
	Conduct site assessments and feasibility studies.
	Prepare and review technical drawings, wiring diagrams, and specifications.
	Ensure compliance with relevant electrical and safety standards (NEC, IEC, etc.).
	Troubleshoot system issues and provide technical support.
	Collaborate with project managers, technicians, and clients for smooth project execution.
	Prepare project documentation, reports, and handover manuals.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
	3&ndash;5 years of proven experience in solar power systems design and implementation.
	Strong knowledge of solar PV systems, inverters, charge controllers, batteries, and grid integration.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, PVsyst, Helioscope, or similar solar design software.
	Understanding of national and international electrical codes and standards.
	Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
	Ability to travel to project sites as required.
	
	Certification in Renewable Energy or Solar PV installation (e.g., NABCEP, SON) is an added advantage.
	


Preferred Attributes:


	Self-driven and highly organized.
	Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
	Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and innovations in the solar sector.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Resume and Cover letter&nbsp;to:&nbsp;frederickdamilare@gmail.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Electrical Engineer - Solar Energy&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",

Electrical Engineer Job at Talent-Nest Recruitment Hub




        
    

        
        Talent-Nest Recruitment Hub - We are a forward-thinking renewable energy company committed to accelerating the transition to clean and sustainable power solutions. Our portfolio spans solar PV, wind, battery storage, and hybrid energy systems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer
Job Location: Oregun Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a skilled and motivated Electrical Engineer with 3–5 years of experience in the solar energy industry.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing electrical systems and solutions for solar power projects, ensuring quality, efficiency, and regulatory compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop electrical systems and layouts for solar PV installations (on-grid and off-grid).
	Perform load calculations, system sizing, and equipment selection.
	Supervise and coordinate the installation, commissioning, and maintenance of solar power systems.
	Conduct site assessments and feasibility studies.
	Prepare and review technical drawings, wiring diagrams, and specifications.
	Ensure compliance with relevant electrical and safety standards (NEC, IEC, etc.).
	Troubleshoot system issues and provide technical support.
	Collaborate with project managers, technicians, and clients for smooth project execution.
	Prepare project documentation, reports, and handover manuals.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
	3–5 years of proven experience in solar power systems design and implementation.
	Strong knowledge of solar PV systems, inverters, charge controllers, batteries, and grid integration.
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, PVsyst, Helioscope, or similar solar design software.
	Understanding of national and international electrical codes and standards.
	Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
	Ability to travel to project sites as required.
	
	Certification in Renewable Energy or Solar PV installation (e.g., NABCEP, SON) is an added advantage.
	


Preferred Attributes:


	Self-driven and highly organized.
	Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
	Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
	Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and innovations in the solar sector.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Resume and Cover letter to: frederickdamilare@gmail.com using “Electrical Engineer - Solar Energy” as the subject of the mail.

  "description": "AL-Truehand Better Design Limited is an architectural anda multidisciplinary design companyfocused on providing premium design andachievable solutions. With a strong belief that everyone deserves better design. We focus on all kinds of designs and renovation, turnkey delivery, interiors, finishing and furnishingand general construction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key&nbsp;Responsibilities


	Serve as the first point of contact and liaison between the MD and internal/external stakeholders, clients, and partners.
	Manage the MD&#39;s complex calendar, schedule appointments, and coordinate travel arrangements.
	Prepare and edit correspondence, reports, and presentations on behalf of the MD.

Research & Development Officer Job at SecureID Limited




        
    

        
        SecureID Limited is a smart card manufacturing and personalisation bureau with expertise in the deployment and integration of digital solutions. Historically, we are positioned as the first commercially operated smart card manufacturing plant in sub-Saharan Africa with the ability to manufacture Poly-carbonate Cards amongst other card types.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Research & Development Officer

Job Location: Oshodi - Isolo, Lagos

Role Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Initiate, develop, and establish a culture of innovation across the organization. 
	Continuously improve innovation framework in all functional areas.
	Carry out research on technological trends and assist in developing technology road map on a quarterly basis. 
	Develop innovative card products which act as Unique selling points.
	Seek, develop, and maintain strong working relationships with strategic suppliers.
	Establish and maintain strong working relationships with internal and external customers.
	Liaises with clients, potential clients, existing and potential technical partners, on issues relating to all solutions, including Cards and Biometrics.
	Assist and Support Sales/Marketing team to define customer needs.
	Technical analysis of client’s requirements and deriving solutions architecture.
	Assist in deployment of Solutions towards meeting external clients’ needs.
	Develop new products according to the market needs and according to prepared product road map.
	Keep track of processes in the industry and make required upgrades. 
	Keeps records  and provide all research and Presales support for all card projects.


Educational & Professional Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Information Technology.
	MBA/M.Sc. in Relevant Field.
	Lead Auditor ISO 9000 : 2015 QMS
	Project Management Professional (PMP)
	Any other relevant Professional Certifications.


Competencies & Skills:


	Deep knowledge and understanding of the smart card technology and processes.
	In depth understanding of PCI standards, and any other Scheme requirement.
	In depth understanding of payment industry
	Excellent Project Management skills
	Excellent research orientation;
	High level of speaking and presentation ability.

	3 - 5 years of hands-on accounting experience.

	Excellent organisational and time management skills.

Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: frederickdamilare@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
